accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure #FDD500 is used with BLACK text, not white. Use White text on #222222 backgrounds.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Barlow Condensed' for all headings to give that gaming feel.
Ensure all backgrounds are strictly #222222 or #1E1E1E. Do not use standard slate/gray colors.
For the 'Minotar' integration, use the URL format: https://minotar.net/avatar/{username}/100
Implement the 'Button' component with the 3D click effect (shadow-bottom) defined in components.buttons.primary.
For Leaderboards, use a table layout but make it look like a high-tech dashboard.
The Market section should use a grid of cards with the item image prominent.
Admin panel should be cleaner, less 'gaming' heavy, more functional, but still dark mode.
